A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. ingredients.title: For Salad and Toppings
ingredients.list:
2 small onions, white
1 tomato, finely chopped
1 tablespoon vegetable oil
6 cloves garlic
2 inch piece fresh ginger
1 teaspoon red chilli powder

ingredients.title: For main dish
ingredients.list:
3 medium sized potatoes
1 bunch of fresh spinach
2 medium sized carrots
4 small tomatoes
200g fresh curd, without cream
Coriander leaves, medium chopped
